mapper.select: SELECT TENANT_ID , ENTER_CD , ORG_CD , ORG_NM , SYMD , EYMD , ORG_TYPE , NOTE FROM WTM_ORG_CODE WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND ENTER_CD = #{enterCd} AND (ORG_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orgKeyword}, '%') OR ORG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orgKeyword}, '%')) AND CASE WHEN #{sYmd} = '' THEN F_WTM_DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE,'YMD') ELSE REPLACE(#{sYmd}, '-', '') END BETWEEN SYMD AND EYMD
